title: Where's me skin?
body:
Hey everyone so i have a problem with Hex Tech recently i saved up all my tokens in order to buy Championship Ashe{{champion:22}}  chrome (Golden). I didn't own the skin before hand and after i unlocked it it gave me only the ward that comes with it, but it did not unlock Championship Skin {{champion:22}} . I've asked multi-people  if they were  having the same issue and no luck.  Everyone said they got it as soon as they spent their tokens.

When should i get my skin? PLZ help{{sticker:sg-janna}}

replies.body: Hey there, the chromas are unlocked but you still need to own the skin in order to use it.  Looking into this for you, I see you have the chroma but you don't have the skin unlocked yet.  Once you unlock Championship Ashe you should be all set.

"Spend all your tokens on this chroma" 
"Now buy the skin or its useless" have fun with your icon
I understand there was some confusion on this.  Feel free to reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and we'll see if we can help you directly.
okay will do thank you for thy help{{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}
you answered at the wrong guy lol
